name: Bagel and cream cheese
details: A bagel and cream cheese is a common food pairing in American cuisine, the cuisine of New York City, and American Jewish cuisine, consisting in its basic form of a sliced bagel spread with cream cheese.

name: Breakfast Sandwich
details: A breakfast sandwich is any sandwich filled with foods associated with the breakfast meal. Breakfast sandwiches-foodies at fast food restaurants and delicatessens or bought as fast, ready to heat and eat sandwiches from a store. Breakfast sandwiches are commonly made at home

name: Baked Chicken
details: A medium chicken breast will take 18 â€“ 20 minutes to bake at 220C / 425F. Cooking it hard and fast at a high temperature is the secret to gorgeous cartelization and ultra juicy chicken inside

name: Eggs Benedict
details: Eggs Benedict is a common American breakfast or brunch dish, consisting of two halves of an English muffin, each topped with Canadian bacon, a poached egg, and hollandaise sauce. It was popularized in New York City

name: Tost Croissant Fried Egg
details: This Croissant Sandwich Recipe is a great way to start the day! It includes soft scrambled eggs, veggies, and cheddar cheese!

name: Full Breakfast Fried Egg
details: Remember that in the kitchen the perfect is the enemy of the good (and also the good breakfast). I would happily serve these to a hungry crowd during brunch and even the most finicky of guests will be happy with them!
